Html: I re-downloaded the CTP Docs and the help screen generated page not found errorrs.  Its not my connection.  Any solutions to getting this on my machine.  I can use the online tech docs but, I haven't looked for the site that the docs are located on so a link to that would be appreciated.

Hi,

As it is explained in this forum thread of Michael Puleio, the product team has updated the API references download links. The format is CHM and it is necessary to unblock them:

  • Prism 4 API Reference-Silverlight CHM
  • Prism 4 API Reference-Desktop CHM

Please, take into account that the online reference has not updated yet.  

Please let me know if this helps.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero

Thanks, I didn't understand the directions.  Maybe if it were to say:

Once you've installed the chm file, right-click on its icon, choose the properties option and then select the unblock utton option in order to view the help files.

 

Thanks...  baby steps...
